Alban Shahaj

Software Developer and Data Analyst

About Me

Hi, my name’s Alban and I’m a software developer and data analyst. My main role is to develop and maintain client side applications (local and web apps) used for collecting data. I am also responsible for all the documentation, support and training provided to the various colleagues, external stackeholders and data providers. I started my career as software developer since 2017 just after my graduation in computer science.

What I like the most is: develop software and try to achive interesting goals, travel and discover new cultures as well as being able to talk with animals in a comprehensible language (who wants to help me?).

Projects

FoodEx2 Smart Coding App (front-end)

foodex2-sca-openefsa

FoodEx2 Smart Coding application front-end aims to simplify coding in the FoodEx2 system in a faster and easier way. The app proposes the food terms related with the food description given in input. The front-end uses lit-element base class for enabling creation of web components which can be re-used in other projects.

FoodEx2 Smart Coding App (back-end)

foodex2-sca-openefsa

FoodEx2 Smart Coding application back-end exposes the various functionalities provided by the trained simple convutional neural network models (built with Spacy) through python Flask.
